content: great for showing off the colours in a variegated yarn it also looks classy when worked in a solid colour the pattern is a modified less open version of the seafoam stitch and is worked over a multiple of 10 sts + 10 it includes a garter edging which makes a nice neat border that helps keep the shape simply increase the number of stitches in multiples of 10 to widen the scarf or make into a stole **permission is given to share this pattern freely in unmodified form provided no profits are made from its distribution ** *the rav pdf link has been temporarily disabled due to a transposition error on the chart if you have already downloaded this version the accompanying written instructions are correct there is a correct version of the chart at the above blog link *
